column1: A search of the apartment revealed the following digital devices: door sensors at the main door
column3: wristband on the floor where the victims’ body was found
column4: mobile phone on the floor where the victims’ body was found
column6: Google OnHub wifi router connected to SmartThings Hub and IPTime switch
column9: Raspberry Pi connected via HDMI to TV
column11: door sensor at the bedroom door
column12: husband’s mobile phone. Data collected from the above devices is made available to the investigators.
